intro: Unpack your memories, relax, and let the summer linger a little longer.
description:
Summer may be ending, but your adventure is just beginning! In Summer Unpacked, you’ll revisit the cozy moments of your summer days through many charming puzzle levels. Sort your souvenirs, organize your travel bags, and rediscover the little joys that made the season special. Each puzzle is a gentle reminder of sunny afternoons, seaside picnics, and long, golden sunsets.


Relax, take your time, and enjoy the soothing gameplay designed to bring back those warm summer vibes. Whether you’re folding clothes, arranging postcards, or fitting keepsakes perfectly into place - every level tells a quiet story of nostalgia and peace. It’s the perfect way to say goodbye to summer… without really letting it go.


KEY FEATURES: 
- Over 30 cozy puzzle levels inspired by the end of summer
- Relaxing gameplay full of gentle logic and organization challenges
- Beautiful, sun-washed visuals and calm ambient soundtrack
- Feel-good atmosphere perfect for winding down
- Satisfying mix of sorting, arranging, and fitting puzzles
